categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Grejj served in the Imperial Army to the garrison on Vryssa as lieutenant.

Sent out in command of an AT-AT to prevent Boba Fett from infiltrating the base, Grejj died when the bounty hunter cut communications and hijacked a second AT-AT under the control of Byrga. Two AT-STs stumbled into the fight and, confused by the battle, fired on Grejj's walker.
